label: LogisticsTransportMeans
comment: The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not there is an approved security plan onboard this logistics transport means.
The code specifying the conference for this logistics means of transport.
The indication of whether or not this logistics means of transport is accompanied by a driver.
The indication of whether or not there is a helipad on this logistics means of transport.
The code specifying the International Ship and Port facility Security (ISPS) level assigned to this logistics means of transport.
The manufacturing date, time, date time, or other date time value for this logistics means of transport.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The indication of whether or not a Sanitation Control Exemption or Certificate re-inspection is required for this logistics transport means.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
The type, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport.
The code specifying the type of logistics means of transport (Reference UNECE Recommendation 28).
The indication of whether or not there is a valid Sanitation Control Exemption or Certificate onboard this logistics transport means.
The indication of whether or not there is a waste reporting exemption for this logistics means of transport.

objectProperties.comment: The draught level measured at the aft end of this transport means.
An air draught level measure for this logistics transport means.
A logistics service charge applicable to this supply chain consignment item.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
An IOT device attached to this logistics transport means.
A piece of logistics transport equipment attached to this logistics means of transport.
A certified level of pollution calculated for an emission from this logistics transport means.
A person who is a company security officer for this logistics transport means.
The measure of the draught level of this logistics means of transport.
The draught level measured at the fore end of this transport means.
The referenced ISSC (International Ship Security Certificate) document for this logistics transport means.
The trade party authorized to issue the International Ship Security Certificate (ISSC) for this logistics means of transport.
The measure of the length of this logistics means of transport.
The measure of the external length required in a lane for this logistics transport means.
The measure of the cargo loaded onto this logistics means of transport, such as the number of barrels of oil or other quantity of breakbulk cargo.
The manoeuvring speed measured for this logistics means of transport.
A manufacturer party for this production process.
A certificate applicable to a maritime logistics transport means.
The country of nationality of the operator of this logistics means of transport.
A trade party who is an operator of this product handling process.
The owner agent trade party for this logistics means of transport.
A party who owns this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The country of registration of this logistics means of transport.
A registration event of this logistics transport means.
A transport service required for this logistics means of transport.
A sanitation control document for this logistics transport means.
A trade party providing services for this logistics means of transport.
Spatial dimensions specified for this logistics means of transport.
A calculated emission specified for this logistics transport means.
An identified defect specified for this logistics means of transport.
Handling instructions specified for this logistics means of transport.
The measure of the total gross weight (mass) of all cargo loaded onto this logistics means of transport, including packaging but excluding any associated transport equipment.
The deadweight tonnage measure for this logistics transport means.
A measure of the gross weight (mass) of this referenced supply chain consignment which includes the weight of packaging but which excludes the weight of any transport equipment.
A measure of the net weight (mass) of this consignment which excludes the weight of packaging of this supply chain consignment and that of any transport equipment.
The measure of the tare weight (mass) of this logistics means of transport which is the weight (mass) including permanent equipment but excluding goods and loose accessories.

referencedBy.comment: The means of transport applicable to this supply chain consignment item.
A means of transport actively powering this logistics convoy.
A means of transport not actively powering this logistics convoy.
A transport means specified for this piece of logistics transport equipment.
The means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.
